at the wealthy and prosperous oregon

it seems that today is my lucky day do

yes your majesty now the throne will be

it turned out that abby was a fairy she

fairy tales
once upon a time there lived a
hard-working and kind man named colin
who worked as a cloth seller every day
he brought his cloths everywhere to sell
them
his clothes were really good and pretty
so they were favored by everyone
in a hot sunny day colin continued to
wander around with his most beautiful
cloths
[Music]
it's too hot the weather is so harsh i
need to find somewhere to rest to a big
tree he met a man who also rested there
he was blake a bum who was wandering in
the woods
hello my friend do you have anything to
eat please share me something i haven't
eaten anything for today
colin kindly shared half of his meal
with blake
i'm blake a losing man my money went
away with my business
i have been fighting for a suitable job
for a long time
now i have nothing to eat and luckily i
met you here
and i'm calling a close seller poor you
or can you go with me and help me sell

oh you have many beautiful clothes can

if we can sell them out that will be a

well well
i will be able to get over the hunger if

you said that i can go with you to sell
these clothes

yes we will sell them together and i

believe me i can do it let's go these

exhausted
i'm i'm so tired

heavy

well then he came closer to check it

hey colin i've just found the well come

that's great i'm really thirsty
this well is so dry and so deep what can

water inside
i know the way now i will tie this rope
around my waist and you will stand here
pull me up when i finish drinking water
to your turn i will do the same thing
okay
thinking that was reasonable then colin

a little bit more
i'm about to be there
after drinking the water colin pulled

colin the water is really cool and fresh
now it's my turn to help you
[Music]

well it's refreshing
blake i'm done
pull me up
what a fool now the clothes are mine if

where are you
hold me up
what happened
blake
gosh could it be that he left me here
don't do that blake
is anyone there
help me
please
oh

i have to sit here waiting to be dead

please

he thought for a while and said
it's all right i can see that you're a

snake
how do you talk

it's about to rain
follow this route you can see an

you can rest
there thank you serpent god thank you so

colin also saw the abandoned house in

oh
i'm so lucky finally i could have a

that's great

[Music]
a contract between a beautiful girl and
an ugly goblin
what did they exchange
let's find out in today's story with
woah fairy tales
once upon a time there was a kind young
girl whose name was andrea
she lived together with her mom in a
small house
they just led a happy and peaceful life
day by day
until one day andrea's mom fell sick she
tried all the ways to cure her mom but
there weren't any improvements
seeing her mom get weaker gradually
andrea was so depressed but she didn't
give up she decided to go and find the
best doctors in other places
an old man in the village told her to
find the goblin that lived in a mountain
six miles away
maybe it could help her mom
[Music]
andrea you shall go to that mountain
look for a goblin living there she might
help
andrea thanked the old man and went on
immediately
she went through a very long road across
the deep forest and finally came to the
goblins shelter
andrea saw a big cave entrance in front
of her and she decided to go inside
stepping inside the cave she saw a
goblin with a small figure and an ugly
face that was sitting next to the fire
she approached it and said hello
hello
i'm andrea who lives in a village six
miles away from here i'm sorry to
disturb you now
the goblin looked at her irritatedly
what are you here for
andrea told the goblin about her mom and
asked it to help her
after hearing andrea's honest words the
goblin thought for a while
then it looked joyful all right
i'll help you but we have to exchange
something i can't help you for free do
you have anything valuable like gold or
silver i don't have any valuable things
with me but if you saved my mom i would
be your assistant is it okay
upon hearing that the goblin disagreed
and it suggested one condition
if so then you have to sign a contract
when your mom recovered your name would
belong to me
andrea really wanted to help her mom
therefore she immediately agreed with
the goblins condition and signed the
contract
after signing the contract she said
goodbye to the goblin and returned home
the goblin was smiling behind her
finally it had a proper name
coming home andrea was very happy to see
her mom recovered and walking around she
came to hug her but it was strange that
her mom didn't see andrea nor feel that
she was there
she shouted so that her mom could hear
but nothing happened
she terrifiedly ran out tried to talk to
other people but just like her mom no
one could hear what she said
suddenly andrea remembered the contract
it turned out that the goblin didn't
just take her name but also her identity
as well since then she was like an
invisible shadow inside her own village
and walked around desperately every day
on this side after taking andrea's name
the goblin turned into her and went to
andrea's house to live
with its wicked insidious nature the
goblin kept doing bad things and created
hatred among the villagers andrea's
village used to be peaceful
everyone got on well with each other
since the goblin's arrival it kept
dividing all the people and made them
hate each other it also disrupted her
mom and didn't care about her at all
it sold all the properties in her house
and even andrea's father's pearl
necklace that depressed her mom a great
deal
andrea was furious she came to see the
goblin and asked it to stop doing bad
things and give back her name you
tricked me to use my name and harm
everyone give me my name back right now
you already signed the contract that it
is not that easy to take back your name
andrea kept persuading the goblin with a
hope that it would give back her name
all right i can return your name but you
have to surpass my two challenges if you
lose you had to replace me and become
the ugly goblin lived in the cave and
hated by everyone the first challenge is
to defeat the ferocious white tiger that
lived inside the forest
andrea accepted the challenge and went
into the forest to find it the white
tiger was huge and fierce and she could
never beat it with her strength
therefore she had come up with another
way
she found the tiger and tried to
approach it tiger i admire you a lot for
your invincible power but there's
another tiger near here that insulted
you and assumed that you are not as
strong as him
the white tiger was very angry to hear
that its hunger for victory instantly
rose up
bring it to me now i have to teach it a
lesson
it is lying over there you should go
there now
the white tiger looked at the stream and
saw another tiger there it roared and
the other one roared as well
the tiger angrily attacked with its
fangs then slipped and got carried away
by the water
come on girl please help me i will
appreciate this for my whole life
with her kind nature andrea helped the
tiger with one condition that it had to
go far away so that the goblin wouldn't
find out that it was still alive
moreover the tiger must not harm humans
anymore
the tiger was moved by andrea's kindness
it gave her one of the fangs to prove to
the goblin and also protect her in
dangerous situations
andrea took the fang and said goodbye to
the tiger
when she returned to the village andrea
showed the fang to the goblin i defeated
the white tiger and completed your first
challenge
very good i can't expect you to overcome
such a hard challenge prepare yourself
for the final one
the goblin gave the second challenge to
her you are just lucky but i won't let
that happen this time
i will cast a spell so that everyone can
see you tomorrow morning we will stand
in front of your mom and if she could
tell who her daughter is i would return
your name the next day she and the
goblin stood in front of her mom at the
villagers witness
both of them tried to prove that they
were the mom's daughters she didn't
really know who was the exact one
suddenly the mom came up with an idea
my daughter is very grateful to parents
she won't let me do the hard work ever i
have to try this on both of them
sweetheart you look tired now let me
cook the meal and wash the clothings for
you
oh dear mom you are the greatest person
on earth
huh
but it didn't expect that she went to
andrea and said the exact thing
sweetheart you look tired now let me
cook the meal and wash the clothings for
you
andrea saw the mom and she hugged her
mom you have been strenuous for those
previous days let me do all of them
the mom happily pointed at andrea and
said to the villagers that it was her
daughter
the goblin lost so it got angry it
showed its true self and attacked andrea
it cast a spell at her chest
luckily andreas still carried the bang
with her the spell hit it and reflected
the goblin was hit by its own spell and
yelled painfully before turning into
dust
the goblin was destroyed forever the
villagers had a peaceful life again as
they used to before
andrea and her mom hugged each other
tightly and tears dropped on their faces
since then they lived a happy and
peaceful life forever after
you
